00209     virtual Event::Connection   subscribeEvent(EventSet* target, const String& name, Event::Group group, const String& subscriber_name) = 0;
00210 
00221     static void setDefaultResourceGroup(const String& resourceGroup)
00222         { d_defaultResourceGroup = resourceGroup; }
